website_summaries.verdict: Preps and heals your scalp all in one powerful scrub.
pros: Noted for its effectiveness in terms of reducing flakes and revitalizing your scalp
We love the added hair volume this product can generate as well
A trusted brand that delivers quality results one would expect from its reputation
cons: Some customers report the scent is rather strong and can linger

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this product! I have hair that I tend to wear both wavy/curly and straight (depends on my mood!), so I end up with a lot of product build-up. This took all of the build-up out of my hair. My hair felt so clean that I cannot tell you the last time my hair has felt this good! I will definitely put this product on my "must-buy" list!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have scalp issues because of medications. I get dandruff and adult cradle cap in the winter which is embarrassing. This stuff is fabulous. Feels good on my scalp. Rinses clean. Takes care of these issues. I use it a couple times a week with my regular routine. Cheaper than other brands. Only need a small amount. Will be part of my cleansing routine from now on.
customer_reviews.author: DoodleBugs

customer_reviews.title: Easy on your hair color!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best I've found so far for not washing out my hair color. I have to use dandruff shampoo or my scalp breaks out. I use it daily and my color holds out great. I'm on my second bottle
customer_reviews.author: T. Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, but a little tough to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help combat the winter flakiness on my scalp, and it seems to have helped. My hair is on the thicker and longer side, so I find it a little tough to get it down to my scalp on the backside of my head, but I managed. Definitely seems to exfoliate (my head felt a little more sensitive to the heat of the water after using), and rinses out pretty clean if you follow the directions and do your normal shampoo and conditioner after.
customer_reviews.author: Cherron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product-Love the scent!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS stuff!! Leaves an amazing fragrance on my hair all day! First time I've ever had any issues with Amazon is this one, and only the shipment... These were add on items, and the box was left outside my door in direct afternoon sunlight...in Florida...its 90 today! Needless to say, everything else in the box got a shampoo bath because both tubes popped in the end seam. That's the only reason I'm giving 3 stars...product is 5 stars, delivery 1 star, average is 3 stars!
customer_reviews.author: TrulyDivyn

customer_reviews.title: Beware color treated hair!! Threw away after one use!!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely not anything like any of the other shampoos in this line! It is very harsh and it stripped a lot of the color out of my hair! It also left my hair extremely dry and rough feeling!! I know it is anti-dandruff shampoo, but it says it's gentle on color! On the occasion that I need a little anti-dandruff shampoo, I will stick with Neutrogena or even Head and Shoulders!! They are both effective and much more gentle on my locks!!
customer_reviews.author: Scot

customer_reviews.title: Not effective as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a total of 3 this time for my recurrence bad dandruff. Because I had it half year ago and it resolved my dandruff/itchy scalp issue in two weeks. But this time, it’s not that effective anymore. First, it feels a lot thinner than what I had previously. I’m not sure if the formula has changed or not, but now I had to use at least double portion of what I used to do to soak my hair or even more. My hair looks great right after washing but I can still see dandruff hidden underneath. On the second day, the dandruff would massively came back, and my hair looks pretty oily :(
customer_reviews.author: JenK.

customer_reviews.title: Lessens scalp flake and itch leaves hair soft!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I very rarely write reviews for anything but this stuff is such a godsend that I had to. I've suffered from a horribly itchy, and flaky scalp for almost a decade. I've tried using dandruff shampoo in the past but I hated the greasy film it left on my hair. Not only does this stuff make my hair nice and soft after use, it keeps my scalp flake free and gets rid of product buildup. My scalp is much less itchy and even if I do have the occasional itch, there's practically no flake. Love, love, love this stuff. Please don't ever change.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Tamayo

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair fell like crazy
customer_reviews.text: This product, specially the “scrub treatment” made my hair fell like crazy, I was about to cry in the shower when I saw tons of hairs falling when rinsing it and also after the shampoo and when I was untangling it with the brush, its normal to lose and approximate of 100 hairs a day but this was full strands falling and just in the shower and a little after, I’m sure that throughout the day they kept falling, this was not normal hair falling cycle, it have never happened to me before with any other product
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Stinks, Even After Shampooing & Conditioning
customer_reviews.text: This product cleansed my scalp okay, but nothing to brag about. The smell of it is AWFUL and does not go away with washing and conditioning directly after use. My granddaughter and husband both said my hair smelled like industrial chemicals. I thought it smelled like dirt mixed with men's cologne. Using a facial apricot scrub does a much better job on my scalp than this product. I returned this.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for Keratina users
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to find a dandruff shampoo without Sulfate for Keratina users! Look no more. Here it is, and affordable. YES! Stock up. It works as expected and smells great unlike other dandruff shampoos. Love this product and brand!
customer_reviews.author: Lissette B. B.

customer_reviews.title: Really good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shampoo, I use to buy it at my nearest pharmacy but for any reason they don’t sell it anymore. Being honest, no, the scent is not good and if makes my hair very dry, but I can say that it is much better for the dandruff that any other famous shampoo. After a few uses I can see the difference and that is what I need. Also it is a vegan product, no chemicals damiging your hair. If you have the same problem as I do, I recommend to use it until the dandruff is gone and you can go back to your regular shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Inma

customer_reviews.title: Good product, color-safe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a month or so now and my dandruff is better, but not gone. It definitely makes my hair look better! I was worried it would strip my color, but it really is color-safe! I have blue hair and it hasn’t faded any faster than usual. BUT make sure to use a really good conditioner with this - it makes my very healthy hair feel like a broom until I apply a generous blob of conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Great way to smell like an old lady
customer_reviews.text: Smells awful! It is like a really strong perfume! And it lasts past just being in the shower, and then you get to deal with smelling like an old lady with tons of perfume on for the rest of the day. It also hurt my scalp for some reason, so do not use this if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Epic

customer_reviews.title: I adore this shampoo! Super Clean Feeling~
customer_reviews.text: This scent is a very light crisp, clean scent and I am amazed how clean my skin feels after using this. Shower too, haha. But seriously, I will continue to purchase this shampoo. Way better than some of the fancy brands that I've tried--though, as far as dandruff elimination--I think it will take time. Definitely not as quick as Selsun or two strong rinses of Apple Cider Vinegar (hold you nose LOL and *do not get in eyes--though I noticed clear vision afterwards). Hehe~ Very nice shampoo, worth the $6.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Y’all. This stuff is a game changer. I researched several scalp exfoliants (most of which were at a much higher price point), and decided to try this one. I’m really glad I did! I suffer from dry scalp and sensitive skin, which is aggravated by the cold weather causing visible flaking. I’ve used this product once a week for three weeks and my scalp has visibly improved! This product exfoliates very gently and after rinsing, even before washing/conditioning, my hair feels amazing. Also a perk: it’s sulfate free. Absolutely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Light flaking be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I broke down and got this after I noticed some light flaking on my scalp, especially at my (very visible) part. It’s been working great to reduce flaking and doesn’t appear to impact my hair color (I have quite a few highlights). I use it about once a week. The smell is nice (not medicinal) and the cleansing power of the shampoo seems stronger than a lot of other shampoos I have used over the years. I’ll continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Made my dandruff worse
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with dandruff for years and eventually found a shampoo that worked for me, but I wanted to find something a little less harsh. Even though this is more natural and doesnt have sulfates or parabens, I found that it made my dandruff worse than better. I'm giving it 3 stars because it did make my hair feel soft after washing and it may work better depending on the person, just for me it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Harsh on hair
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sulfate free shampoo that is also dandruff control. I normally use Head and Shoulders which has worked amazingly for me, but it contains sulfates and I have been told that sulfates are rough on color treated hair and also other hair smoothing treatments. I tried this product and my hair felt totally stripped! Head and Shoulders is so much easier on my hair and honestly I have never had color fade using Head and Shoulders. Going back...I think this sulfate free thing being easier on your hair is silly. There are so many other ingredients involved... I am going to use what makes my hair feel best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, this shampoo leaves the strands of my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this shampoo leaves the strands of my hair feeling very dry, and within a day my scalp feels oily. I've never in my life had an oily scalp. This was really puzzling to me. It's frustrating because I wanted a sulfate free shampoo for my color treated hair with the additional treatment for a DRY scalp. As I said, my actual hair feels dry with this shampoo and my scalp seems oily the next day. I have stopped using this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinks and is thick like school glue....
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how well this works as I have only used it once. It does smell like dog flea shampoo/ bad incense mix. When it comes out it makes you think of Elmers Glue... consistency and color. Does not suds up well but will see. If it works that's all I care about. Will update when I have had a chance to use it more.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Works on color treated hair
customer_reviews.text: During pregnancy, my scalp was drier and itchier than normal, but I didn't want to strip the color from my hair. I read some reviews online and liked the price of this shampoo. I was pleased with the results and have seen a difference in my hair. The color hasn't noticeably faded and the itchiness has calmed down. If you need a cost-effective option, I recommend trying this!
customer_reviews.author: BoScha

customer_reviews.title: Very strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Tried this scalp scrub today and the smell was overwhelming. It smells like men's cologne and now *I* have smelled like men's cologne all day long, even though I washed and conditioned my hair after using this. Not sure it did much of anything as far as exfoliating my scalp, but I won't be using it again due to the smell.
customer_reviews.author: K.L.

customer_reviews.title: No more flakes
customer_reviews.text: This product feels gelatinous on the hands. I expected it to be harsh in my head. Instead, it feels cool and almost relaxing when I massage it into my scalp. My issues with a flaky scalp have gone away since using it, but to be fair, I’ve combined it with a Netrogena t-gel shampoo. If you are sensitive to smells, I recommend trying just this first.
customer_reviews.author: book house

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Did not help with dandruff whatsoever. My stylist said I need to do a few deep conditioning treatments because this stuff dried my hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: This works! My head feels amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been having a hard time with finding a good scalp exfoliating scrub. Either they leave my head feeling really gritty or my hair feels oily but THIS one works great for me. It’s kinda like slime when you scoop it out of the jar but it is amazing. It rinses off clean and my scalp feels so much better after use. I will definitely be getting more of this.
customer_reviews.author: D Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great products!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these products! I cannot find these, locally, to purchase, so I’m a regular buyer on Amazon for this! I have REAL BAD seborrigha dermatitis! This helps to control the itch and dandruff. Plus it doesn’t strip my color and it leaves my hair silky soft!!!
customer_reviews.author: dodo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of this whole line, and was happy to see an anti-dandruff option. Seems to work as promised, so that's really all there is to say! Smell is pleasant, unlike some other anti-dandruff products, which is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Cherron

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Worked and was surprised during cold weather my.scalp gets dry but even this spring I was noticing I dont know if its cause I wash my hair everyday and I do use alot of hair spray and gel but then I stopped for awhile but using this product was amazing just wish it smelled good
customer_reviews.author: BellaDoll

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for saving my scalp!
customer_reviews.text: This saved my scalp! I lighten my hair, do Brazilian blowout, have tape in extensions - that combined with other the ultra dry air and overly treated water of Los Angeles was destroying my scalp. I’ve tried everything, T Sal, T Gel, head and Shoulders and nothing worked. After 2-3 washes, no itching and no flakes! It smells good too, not like other dandruff shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need
customer_reviews.text: If you have dandruff or looking for that ultimate clean feeling this is for you. It smells good and does a good job cleaning to, I do have to use a little bit more than usual but I don’t mind because it does the job. I do not use this daily but as needed with my scalp is a little flaky
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong Herb smell if you are into that..
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with psoriasis on my scalp that I'm willing to try anything. I came across this product and the scrubbing mask did help control the symptoms, but the smell is so so strong, like herbs/botanical, that it gave me headaches. I used other hair products to mask the scent, but I don't want extra steps or products on my hair, so I moved on.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few weeks and haven't noticed any difference. My hair is only slightly dryer than it was with other L'Oreal Ever- shampoos, but I don't like the scent of this more than other non-dandruff shampoos and for the intended purpose it has not made any difference for me so far. I'll keep using it since it's sulfate free and my hair is manageable enough but I wouldn't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS STUFF!! AMAZING fragrance left in my hair, that lasts all day too. I like that it doesn't leave my hair feeling greasy, or the opposite...
customer_reviews.author: TrulyDivyn

customer_reviews.title: Gross smell and texture
customer_reviews.text: If you can get over the gross herbal smell and the gross, lumpy gluey texture, it does a decent job for the price and left my hair nice and soft. Unfortunately the smell lingers even after following with shampoo and conditioner. I probably won’t repurchase once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: M Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not for wavy/curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have high porosity wavy/loose curl hair with an oily scalp and dry, frizzy ends. I tend to get itchy irritated scalp trying to find the balance in frequency of washing. This shampoo helped with the itching after a couple of washes, not immediately. Unfortunately it’s not moisturizing enough for my hair and it feels pretty rough after I rinse it out. It leaves little to no slippage and I have to add lots of conditioner, which I can’t use near my scalp due to the oil! I’m worried that it could cause breakage if I use it very often.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Barnhouse

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price, not a miracle cure.
customer_reviews.text: Worked alright. I am partial to the scent but it has a weird medicinal smell to it, but it’s for dandruff. Cleared most of my mild flakiness. I still have a couple of flakes tho I only use the shampoo once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: This is awkword to apply
customer_reviews.text: Ok directions say to massage into scalp. I think the beeds damage your hair because of the friction or something. Any way when I use this my hair looks terrible. Frizzy & dry. I have very fine hair for reference.
customer_reviews.author: some beach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair that lies flat to my head. When I get hot or the humidity is up, it gets very limp. This product was featured in a magazine to use for added volume. I could not find it at Ulta so ordered from Amazon. This is THE BEST product I have every used. It keeps my hair full and my hair does not go limp when I'm hot or humidity is up. High recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo, doesn't seem to be enough
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the Everfresh Anti-Dandruff Shampoo and Conditioner. I have been using it for over a month now, and have some minor improvements in my dry scalp. In the fall/winter, my sensitive skin issues worsen and I develop dry scalp. I have been literally looking for a solution for years. This product is one of the better one I have used, however, the products seem to not be enough moisturizing wise. I still have minimal flakiness, and looking to be 100% flake-free. This product could not achieve that, but a great item at the price and will probably work for other folks with less sensitive skin and hair.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but just average at the dandruff relief
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel that this product is any better than other's I've used to help get rid of dandruff. It does help relieve itching a little bit and it does smell nice. Other than that, it's just okay. Might be slightly better than Head and Shoulders. One thing I liked about it was that it was Sulfate Free. That's important for me because I have wavy hair that tends to get frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, but doesn't clean well
customer_reviews.text: I was using Head & Shoulders, but I switched to this shampoo after I got my hair colored. This shampoo smells amazing, and I've been so happy with other Loreal sulfate-free shampoos before, but this one doesn't clean my hair very well. My hair still feels dirty after washing, and my dandruff is much worse than it was when I was using Head & Shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo a lot. It works well and smells nice. I like that it is white and not your typical weird blue color that most dandruff shampoos are.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Did not cure the dandruff
customer_reviews.text: the shampoo lathers up well and you can use it sparingly but it didn't help with my itchy head and dandruff, could be just me as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ken G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Non-Keratin Treated Hair
customer_reviews.text: Not for keratin treated hair. It stripped my treatment like a dancer in the champagne room. However, it's great for flakiness so I recommend if you don't have a keratin treatment. I also recommend following it up with intense moisture because it's very drying.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to make the scalp feel clean
customer_reviews.text: I use this occasionally to exfoliate my scalp. I have a itchy scalp, but I do not have flaking at all. When my scalp feels extra itchy I use it and it helps it feel better temporarily.
customer_reviews.author: Gemstones

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great sulfate free shampoo for dandruff & dermatitis! Great price for someone like me with very thick hair! Don't care for the scent all that much, but it's ok. Would give 5 stars if scent was nicer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Traxel

customer_reviews.title: Buy It
customer_reviews.text: I have used A LOT of brands of shampoo/conditioner for color treated dandruff hair - salon brands and all. This is the only one that works. Don’t love the smell but don’t care knowing it works.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fights dandruff but smells like dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t find a sulfate free dandruff shampoo at local stores. This works fine. One huge downside: it smells like dog shampoo. At least it helps your salon treatments last.
customer_reviews.author: Nia P

customer_reviews.title: Dry hair
customer_reviews.text: This dried my hair out crazy bad. I usually use head and shoulders classic clean and it leaves my hair a bit dry but not horrible. However this one left my hair feeling like straw. Don’t really know if it worked on the dandruff since I couldn’t get past my hair being frazzled
customer_reviews.author: Illia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: First Of all, I’ve been using this product for weeks and still have flakes. I’ve used a more expensive dandruff shampoo with the same adrift ingredient as this one, hoping to get more for my $$ . Not only do I have flakes but my highlights turned brassy yellow. I have to use purple conditioner every time with this shampoo to counteract the yellow. Doesn’t work and not safe for blonde highlights!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clear up dandruff as well as Head & Shoulders, but doesn't strip color.
customer_reviews.text: The headline sums up my feelings. Head & Shoulders definitely does a better job of leaving me flake free, but I'll tolerate the little bit of flakiness to not have my hair color fade 2 weeks after it's colored. I wish it came in a larger pump bottle. I go through these tubes sort of quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee M.

customer_reviews.title: wasted about half of the container to try to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Hardly any “scrub” to this product.. wasted about half of the container to try to get it to work but it didn’t make any difference
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product buildup disappeared!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for so long for a product that would get rid of product build up for me! I have tried so many high end and low end products and recently stumbled upon this scrub. I am so happy I took a plunge and bought this product! I have curly hair 2b-c and I wear a lot of products to style and moisturize my hair. I get a lot of build up and this is the first product that has gotten rid of it!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Removed flakes from the scalp
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it advertises, removed flakes and scrubs your scalp and that it is. There isn’t a scent to this or any fancy elements just simple ingredients to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: Probably better scalp scrubs out there
customer_reviews.text: This really didnt seem to do anything. I thought I'd be able to feel the scrub on my scalp, but it really just felt like I was covering my head in conditioner. Wasn't impressed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ison

customer_reviews.title: Smelllllls and feeeeels.
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of my hair and scalp after washing, loved the scent at first because I love lilacs.... but after a while I kinda felt like my hair smelled like wet-dog-after-getting-shampooed-with-dog-shampoo smell. Not sure how I will survive.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Better price than stores/ BEST product for dandruff
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this for dandruff... Works better than everything else on the market. He got use to it NOW we cant find it anywhere but online and Amazon has the BEST price!
customer_reviews.author: Sir&Rowe

customer_reviews.title: I like how hair feels light and extra clean
customer_reviews.text: I used to make hand made hair peeling (sea salt+a little water) but got lazy and decided to go for this product! I like how hair feels light and extra clean. I enjoy the smell as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Noticed such a difference, even with just the first use.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: You get A LOT of bang for your buck. I wasnt a fan of this. It was really hard to rise out. I didnt notice much of a difference personally.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Welden

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for like 7 months now and my hair has never been this dandruff free until I started using this it is a life saver! And it keeps you clear and clean and itch free for up to 2-3 days so I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many dandruff shampoos and most are not color friendly so I thought I'd order this because I have not seen it locally. I love it, it smells great and worked great for my dandruff. Even helps with my scalp itching. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany riggs

customer_reviews.title: Works well but will dry out your hair
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo. It definitely helps soothe my scalp when it gets itchy but be aware it is drying, so conditioner is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sete Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The beads are super tiny I feel like they don't reach my scalp through all the jelly stuff. I thought there would be more scrubbing beads in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Hope to get more shampoo time before I need to color my hair.
customer_reviews.text: First use, hardly faded my color treated hair. Will find out how good my color will last after a couple more shampooing.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: No dandruff anymore!!!! Ec
customer_reviews.text: No dandruff anymore! Peppermint scent sooooo fresh! Excellent! But I just use 2 x week because the hair gets too dry!
customer_reviews.author: R. Mor

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works for getting dead skin off the scalp. But if you have thick hair, you will have to work harder to get it down onto the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Holleman

customer_reviews.title: My hair looks and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with the scalp scrub. My hair is soft, shiny, bouncy, and healthy looking. It smells great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy/shopper

customer_reviews.title: Better than head and shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Had been using Head and Shoulders and the Briogeo charcoal hair exfoliating for a while and the results were descent but I still experienced a lot of dryness and itchiness. This 2 products made it for me and for a more reasonable price!!!! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Tommy13

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Smells AMAZING! Haven’t really noticed a difference to my hair compared to other products, but the smell is so fantastic I keep rebuying (I buy the duo shampoo/conditioner) and have purchased probably a total of 6 bottles so far over the past 9 months
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: did not help my dandruff, dried hair out
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been struggling with dandruff for about a year now. I’ve tried a few things but this really did ABSOLUTELY nothing for my issue. tried the shampoo/conditioner/scrub for about a month now and its literally no change to my dandruff. in fact it’s dried my hair out - very unsatisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: shay

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
